modules.description: Provides functions for executing SQL queries, managing prepared statements, and handling database connections with support for asynchronous and synchronous execution models. Works with data types such as query results, parameterized statements, and connection configurations. Used to safely interact with PostgreSQL databases in applications requiring reliable and type-safe database operations.

This module offers conversion, comparison, and serialization utilities for PostgreSQL value types, including geometric (point, inet), numeric (int, int32, int64), and complex types like hstore and UUID, alongside Core_kernel's Date, Time, and UUID. It supports safe/unsafe conversion patterns for data interoperability, enabling tasks such as parsing IP addresses, managing coordinate systems, and handling time-based data. Use cases include mapping database outputs to OCaml types for structured processing and ensuring type-safe interactions with PostgreSQL's extended data formats.
